data.text: Ban Ki-moon officially just called the meeting to order.  Watch #rioplus20 live: http://t.co/PNRLX1WA
Official plenary session of #RioPlus20 is getting underway.  Watch live here: http://t.co/PNRLX1WA
#Rioplus20 official plenary session is expected to start now. Live webcast tips and more here: http://t.co/CO5domHQ #futurewewant
It's here! World leaders are making their way to #RioPlus20 today. Here's what to expect: http://t.co/IZXLLG17
Wednesday is World Refugee Day, but you can follow @Refugees for updates from the UN Refugee Agency (#UNHCR) all year: http://t.co/nCikZ82Q
In case you missed it, #FutureWeWant text expected to be adopted at #Rioplus20 by world leaders is now online: http://t.co/UpGQ2OCr (pdf)
More on the #FutureWeWant -- a new app launched at #Rioplus20 aims to slash energy costs & greenhouse gas emissions http://t.co/tWfviX7c
Latest from @UN_News_Centre on #Rioplus20 -- countries announce agreement on conference outcome document http://t.co/2egsbuYb
Spread the word! Tell world leaders you support the Future We Choose #UNGSP declaration. Find out how here: http://t.co/8JgEkYUa
Wednesday is World Refugree Day. Refugees leave because they have no choice -- choose to help. http://t.co/QML2wfYV
Ban Ki-moon thanks #Rioplussocial fans for speaking out for a path to a better future  http://t.co/umsxEw3C #futurewewant
Latest on the #FutureWeWant: statement on conclusion of #Rioplus20 negotiations: http://t.co/XDgzDi5d (pdf)
How are forests part of the #futurewewant at #Rioplus20? Find out about this side event & film festival: http://t.co/wVLsx1r4
@manideeplanka Find out more here: http://t.co/7j5So0zy
Turn your world around -- watch this new #FutureWeWant video: http://t.co/SJlaqJyL #Rioplus20 #Rioplussocial
Starts today: #RioPlusSocial with @Mashable, @richardbranson, @kuminaidoo & more:  Watch live: http://t.co/xUE9OBac #FutureWeWant
What's happening on Tuesday at #RioPlus20? Here are a few selected highlights & more behind-the-scenes photos: http://t.co/Uc5vPXif
Many Tuesday #Rioplus20 events focus on water. Find out more here: http://t.co/2Hy76xJy. Follow @UN_Water for updates.
Syria: Rights chief discussed situation at opening of #HumanRights Council http://t.co/LGDFQdbE
Emissions from #Rioplus20 to be compensated by Brazilian projects under @UN_CarbonMechs. Photo & more: http://t.co/HzbqV6TC #FutureWeWant
What's it like to attend #Rioplus20? Our #socialmedia team & #UN colleagues are posting photos here: http://t.co/XE0LoAui
Our #rioplus20 team is at the #rioplussocial reception tonight, looking forward to Tuesday's event. Details: http://t.co/7Cnw7Zth
1st-ever series of connecting flights powered by sustainable alternative fuels en route to #RioPlus20 http://t.co/5Iq92sal #FutureWeWant
The weekend highlights from #Rioplus20, including 'A Date with History' winner @BrttnyTrlfrd's reflection, on Storify http://t.co/ikvWE0JL
Continues at #Rioplus20: Members of @theelders take part in #ungsp event. Watch here: http://t.co/tlOXIxLM. Details: http://t.co/9P2Kfiuq
Now at #Rioplus20: High-level Dialogue on the Future We Choose: Watch here: http://t.co/tlOXIxLM. Details: http://t.co/9P2Kfiuq
A Future Worth Choosing: join Twitter chat w/ @jpasztor (8 am EST Mon). More #RioPlus #UNGSP events: http://t.co/9P2Kfiuq #RioDeclaration
What's happening on Monday at #RioPlus20? Here are a few selected highlights & behind-the-scenes photos: http://t.co/uWCEX7kS

Today in Rio: 1st BioTrade Congress convened by @UNCTAD http://t.co/yA5VSiDD
 #RioPlus20 #FutureWeWant
Starts this week in Geneva: #HumanRights Council holds 20th regular session through 6 July http://t.co/VGbpC4Zz -- follow #HRC20 & @UN_HRC
Is clean water for all possible? See how Ban Ki-moon answered this question from a young person in the US http://t.co/SmIxv4Z1 #FutureWeWant
@jameschau If you come by the Spokesperson's office in RioCentro media centre, please say hello! Nancy & Charlotte from our team are there.
Watch: @Refugees Special Envoy Angelina Jolie's new #video message for World #Refugee Day (June 20) http://t.co/GBK11PEL
Now online: the latest installment of our #FutureWeWant Rio Reads series -- "Archbishop Tutu: The Future I Want" http://t.co/kWugZofJ
Ask questions to @jpasztor now: What can YOU(th) do to make sustainable choices for the #Futurewewant? #RioDeclaration #UNGSP @UN4Youth
@TikaWe Follow @Rioplus20 to see what people are saying.
@patlyte Apply for open posts and find out what we look for here: http://t.co/W1Fs4Bk7. Thanks for your interest!
@shoutyspouty Check with @unfoundation.
Do you have access to clean energy? See what Ban Ki-moon told one young person from Mexico about the #FutureWeWant http://t.co/SmIxv4Z1

Syria: UN observer mission suspends monitoring activities owing to escalating armed violence across the country. http://t.co/kxDM2cOY

#Syria: UN experts deplore escalation of violence & call on all parties to renounce violence http://t.co/nE5YzhGx via @UNrightswire
#RioPlusSocial is almost here & @LinkinPark invites you to take part. Watch here: http://t.co/GsBVK4SM #FutureWeWant
